TopicTitle: How do I revert back to 0.20.00?

Articles.Content: I can't even load the game due to the texture format bug. (i know the revert version thing in Steam but it reverts back to 0.19, I want 0.20)

I always install the new version to a new folder, so I can easily go back. It also allows me to copy saves, screenshots, and addons over. Are you not saving those things and transferring them over? Or did you delete your 0.20 folder after the transfer?
He's using Steam, I don't think it has the option to save to a new folder.

Incorrect, and a little look at the forum would have found you this:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/32755-PSA-You-CAN-play-Steam-version-WITHOUT-running-Steam

Only problem is, you need to do it before you run Steam. This I did this morning, in case 0.20.1 crashed on startup. As it turns out, my 0.20.1 works fine, even with a couple of part packs. Guess I didn't go as crazy as some guys did with mod parts.
